about_the_game:
A young blogger Arina Demidova goes to the Altai Republic to create new material for her subscribers. The thirst for discovery and the desire to explore the world around her will lead to a sacred secret that will change her entire fate on this journey.

Girl blogger decides to go in search of the lost city of the Alatyr kingdom in the territory of the Altai Mountains to make her new fascinating report about it for subscribers.

However, fate is preparing for her completely different turns...

An adventure quest dedicated to the culture, myths and everyday life of the indigenous peoples of the Altai Republic.

Now everyone has the opportunity to immerse themselves in the culture of this mysterious region, without leaving home to visit sacred places and participate in ancient rituals.

■ A meditative adventure through the Altai beauties;

■ While playing, we learn the culture and traditions of the region;

■ We make discoveries in the footsteps of N.K. Roerich, get acquainted with the game world by completing simple tasks;

■ The project is being created with the participation of scientific consultants from the Ministry of Tourism of the Altai Republic.

short_description: Heart of Altai is an exciting story about the adventures of blogger Arina Demidova, searching for a lost city in the Altai Republic. During the trek, she realises that her fate is closely linked to the ultimate goal of this dangerous and mysterious expedition.

Russian*, English
*languages with full audio support
